title: Is modal logic used in applied ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Occasionally. If a formal logic is needed for reasoning in ethical systems, the standard choice is the modal system D. However, most work in ethics is done using only informal logic.
Yes. Example: Passenger says to driver - “There’ll most probably be many people crossing the road when we go passed the school as it finishes now. So you should slow down.”
